hero.eyebrow: Reliable IT for Dental Practices Across Virginia
hero.headline: Future‑ready systems. Human‑ready support.
hero.subheadline: We provide fully managed IT, security, cloud, and support services designed specifically for dental offices—so your practice stays secure, compliant, and running without disruption.

items.title: Fully Managed IT
items.text: Proactive support for workstations, servers, and networks.

items.title: Security & Compliance‑Aware
items.text: HIPAA-aware practices with modern cybersecurity controls.

items.title: Dental-Focused Expertise
items.text: EMR, imaging, front desk, and operatory workflow support.

items.title: Local & Responsive
items.text: Serving Richmond, NOVA, and statewide Virginia.

whyUs.title: Why Dental Practices Choose Us
bullets: Minimized downtime and faster issue resolution
Secure systems designed for healthcare environments
Support that understands clinical and administrative workflows
philosophy: We combine next-gen design with dependable execution, treating your systems as mission-critical because they are.
Our promise is simple: partnership, transparency, and outstanding work—before, during, and after every project.

groups.title: Fully Managed IT Services
items: Workstation and server management (local or cloud)

groups.title: Dental EMR & Clinical Systems Support
items: Imaging system coordination (X‑ray, scanners, vendor integrations)
Secure access for providers and staff
Coordination with EMR vendors and dental software partners

groups.title: Networking, Wi‑Fi, Infrastructure, VoIP & Cameras
items: Secure wired and wireless network design
VLAN segmentation for clinical and guest networks
Business phone systems (call routing and shared main lines)
Security cameras (on-site or compliant cloud-based systems)

pricing.title: Pricing & Service Plans
pricing.subtitle: Our pricing and service plans are tailored to the specific needs of your dental practice—from office size and devices to clinical systems and daily workflow. We build each plan to deliver dependable support, security, and performance at fair, competitive pricing that aligns with today’s market for practices across Virginia.

plans.name: Basic Care Plan
plans.monthly: Monthly pricing: custom quote by office size

plans.name: Premium Care + Extended Warranty
plans.monthly: Monthly pricing: custom quote by office size

rows.premium: Offices wanting full protection & predictable costs

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.lead: We support dental practices of all sizes—from single-location offices to growing multi-site groups. Our services are tailored to the workflows, uptime needs, and security expectations of modern clinical and administrative environments.
challenges: Front-desk uptime is critical during office hours
Operatories depend on reliable workstations, imaging, and network performance
EMR/EHR and imaging systems must remain available and secure
Compliance and patient data protection are non-negotiable
approach: Support aligned with clinical and administrative workflows
Proactive maintenance with minimal disruption during office hours
After-hours maintenance and updates when needed
Clear communication with staff, vendors, and practice leadership
whoWeServe.serviceArea: Richmond, Northern Virginia, and statewide Virginia support
whoWeServe.subtitle: Dental Practices Across Virginia
whoWeServe.serviceAreaBody: Remote-friendly support with on-site capability when needed.

about.title: About
about.whoWeAre: NexGen Binary is a Virginia-based IT services company delivering secure, reliable, and people-first technology solutions for dental and healthcare practices. We partner with offices to strengthen operations, improve system performance, and provide responsive IT support built around real clinical and administrative workflows.
about.leadership: Our leadership brings over 20 years of IT experience across healthcare environments, with a strong foundation in secure systems, infrastructure, and operational support. Our team also brings experience serving dental practices, healthcare organizations, government agencies, and private-sector clients—combining enterprise-level discipline with local responsiveness.
about.licensedBody: We deliver with documentation, accountability, and clear communication from day one.

contact.title: Contact
contact.lead: If you’re looking for reliable IT support that understands dental practices, we’d be happy to connect.
